Description_lang: Causes an area around a random target to become suddenly freezing cold, dealing $77699s2 Frost damage to all targets within $77699A1 yards of the target and encasing them in solid ice for $77699d. When the ice is broken, the targets are released but the breaking ice deals an additional $77715s1 Frost damage to all targets $77715A1 yards around that target, breaking all ice in that area as well.
